headline: Can AT&T Woo Back Customers With Bill Credits for Network Outages?
summary: Despite customer-centric initiatives, T appears to be lurking in forsaken territory and investors would be better off if they avoid this stock at the moment.

headline: Verizon: After A Massive Reset, Here's What We Are Watching
summary: Verizon stock offers a 7% yield for income investors, with Q4 revenue projections driven by iPhone launch and strong cash flow metrics. Read the earnings preview on Seeking Alpha.

headline: Jordan Spieth sees his wrist surgery as a chance to reset. He plans to return at Pebble Beach
summary: Jordan Spieth has been playing golf for a month without pain and plans to return from wrist surgery at the AT&T Pebble Beach Pro-Am, ending his longest stretch without competition and looking at his...

headline: Venu Sports — the proposed sports streaming venture between ESPN, Fox, and Warner Bros. — is no more
summary: Disney's ESPN, Warner Bros. Discovery, and Fox have canceled plans to launch their joint sports streaming service.
